titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13802

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Telegraphing, State Guards, Printing, Hospital, Office Expenses, Services Rendered; Right Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Wm Stewart Dr.

row.cell: To Services Rendered in assisting in the organization of the militia during the month of January 1865

body.p:
Approved, and the Q. M. Genl. of Ky. is ordered to pay same out of militia fund.
Thos E Bramlette
Govr.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of January, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty three Dollars, and Thirty Three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Wm Stewart Dr.

row.cell: To Services Rendered in assisting in the organization of the militia during the month of January 1865

body.p:
Approved, and the Q. M. Genl. of Ky. is ordered to pay same out of militia fund.
Thos E Bramlette
Govr of Ky
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of January, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty three Dollars, and Thirty three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
Wm Stewart
Dollars 83,33/100
Paid Jany 31st, 1865.
23
